ground_truth: She sees the small alley at the end of the L of cabins and starts toward it. She looks ahead at the old house standing against the sky as Lila moves forward, and the CAMERA approaches the house. She moves on, and the house comes nearer. Lila looks up at the house and continues forward purposefully toward the house and the porch. Lila stops at the house and looks up, then turns to it again. The CAMERA MOUNTS the steps to the porch, and Lila's hand pushes the door open, revealing the hallway. Lila ENTERS PAST CAMERA, closes the door, and remains by it for a moment, quiet and listening. Meanwhile, Norman is behind the counter, standing and staring at Sam, who is sitting relaxedly on a small sofa. Lila is halfway up the stairs, and the CAMERA remains at the foot of the stair, TILTING UP as she climbs. She pauses at the head of the stair, observing the closed door to the mother's room on her right. There is a moment of quiet, then the door begins to open, and Lila stands on the threshold, looking in at the room, instantly disturbed by it, and almost chilled, with an expression indicating an impulse to close the door and go away from the room forever. After a moment, she enters, leaving the door open behind her. Inside, there is a four-poster bed without a canopy, a fancy and flounced satin dressing table, a great chiffonier, a big-doored wardrobe, a large oval full-length pier-glass against the wall directly opposite the door, a satin recamier, an upholstered armchair by the window, and a white marble fireplace with a grate cold but piled with ashes. Lila glances at the bed and, after staring at it for a moment, goes to the dressing table. She moves on, catches a glimpse of herself in the pier-glass, is startled, turns away, goes to the chiffonier, is about to open a drawer, sees the high wardrobe out of the corner of her eye, and goes to it hesitantly. She opens one door to see fresh, clean, well-pressed dresses hanging neatly. Lila comes out of the mother's room, closes the door behind her, looks down the stairs, then starts across the hall to the room with the half-open door. Lila pauses on the threshold, reaches in, feels the wall, and throws on a switch. Sam has risen and is standing by the counter now, turning his head to glance out the window at the old house. Lila goes into the room, goes to the chair, and touches it. The touch disturbs the figure, causing it to start turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise movement. Lila looks at it in horror, realizing it is the body of a woman long dead.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: She observes the little passageway at the end of the L of cottages and begins toward it. She gazes ahead at the aged residence standing against the horizon as Lila advances, and the CAMERA advances toward the residence. She proceeds on, and the residence becomes closer. Lila gazes up at the residence and continues forward determinedly toward the residence and the veranda. Lila halts at the residence and gazes up, then turns to it again. The CAMERA ASCENDS the steps to the veranda, and Lila's hand pushes the entrance open, revealing the corridor. Lila ENTERS PAST CAMERA, closes the entrance, and remains by it for a moment, silent and listening. Meanwhile, Norman is behind the counter, standing and gazing at Sam, who is sitting relaxedly on a little couch. Lila is halfway up the steps, and the CAMERA remains at the foot of the stair, TILTING UP as she ascends. She pauses at the head of the stair, observing the closed entrance to the mother's chamber on her right. There is a moment of silence, then the entrance begins to open, and Lila stands on the boundary, looking in at the chamber, instantly unsettled by it, and almost chilled, with an expression indicating an urge to close the entrance and depart from the chamber forever. After a moment, she enters, leaving the entrance open behind her. Inside, there is a four-poster bed without a canopy, an ornate and flounced satin vanity, a great chest of drawers, a large-doored closet, a large oval full-length mirror against the wall directly opposite the entrance, a satin settee, an upholstered armchair by the window, and a white marble hearth with a grate cold but piled with ashes. Lila glances at the bed and, after staring at it for a moment, goes to the vanity. She proceeds on, catches a glimpse of herself in the mirror, is startled, turns away, goes to the chest of drawers, is about to open a drawer, sees the high closet out of the corner of her eye, and goes to it hesitantly. She opens one door to see fresh, clean, well-pressed gowns hanging neatly. Lila exits the mother's chamber, closes the entrance behind her, gazes down the steps, then starts across the corridor to the chamber with the half-open entrance. Lila pauses on the boundary, reaches in, feels the wall, and throws on a switch. Sam has risen and is standing by the counter now, turning his head to gaze out the window at the aged residence. Lila goes into the chamber, goes to the armchair, and touches it. The touch disturbs the figure, causing it to start turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise movement. Lila gazes at it in terror, realizing it is the body of a woman long deceased.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The small alley at the end of the L of cabins is seen by her, and it is started toward by her. The old house standing against the sky is looked at by her as Lila moves forward, and the house is approached by the CAMERA. She is moved on by herself, and the house is brought nearer. The house is looked up at by Lila as she is continued forward purposefully toward the house and the porch by herself. The house is stopped at by Lila, who looks up, then turns to it again. The steps to the porch are mounted by the CAMERA, and the door is pushed open by Lila's hand, revealing the hallway. PAST CAMERA is entered by Lila, the door is closed, and she is remained by it for a moment, quiet and listening. Meanwhile, Norman stands behind the counter and stares at Sam, who sits relaxedly on a small sofa. Lila has been brought halfway up the stairs, and the foot of the stair is remained at by the CAMERA, which TILTS UP as she climbs. The head of the stair is paused at by her, as she observes the closed door to the mother's room on her right. There is a moment of quiet, then the door begins to open, and the threshold is stood on by Lila, who looks in at the room, is instantly disturbed by it, and is almost chilled, with an expression indicating an impulse to close the door and go away from the room forever. After a moment, the room is entered by her, leaving the door open behind her. Inside, there is a four-poster bed without a canopy, a fancy and flounced satin dressing table, a great chiffonier, a big-doored wardrobe, a large oval full-length pier-glass against the wall directly opposite the door, a satin recamier, an upholstered armchair by the window, and a white marble fireplace with a grate cold but piled with ashes. The bed is glanced at by Lila and, after staring at it for a moment, the dressing table is gone to by her. She catches a glimpse of herself in the pier-glass, is startled, turns away, goes to the chiffonier, is about to open a drawer, sees the high wardrobe out of the corner of her eye, and the wardrobe is gone to by her hesitantly. One door is opened by her to see fresh, clean, well-pressed dresses hanging neatly. The mother's room is come out of by Lila, the door is closed behind her, the stairs are looked down, then the room with the half-open door is started across the hall to. Lila pauses on the threshold, reaches in, and a switch is thrown on by her feel of the wall. Sam has risen and stands by the counter now, turning his head to glance out the window at the old house. The room is entered by Lila, the chair is gone to by her, and it is touched by her. The figure is disturbed by the touch, causing it to start turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise movement. It is looked at in horror by Lila, realizing it is the body of a woman long dead.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: She sees the small alley at the end of the L of cabins and heads toward it. She looks at the old house against the sky as Lila moves forward, and the CAMERA approaches the house. As she advances, the house gets closer. Lila looks up at the house and purposefully moves toward the porch. She stops, looks up, then turns to the house again. The CAMERA MOUNTS the porch steps, and Lila pushes the door open, revealing the hallway. Lila ENTERS PAST CAMERA, closes the door, and pauses, listening. Meanwhile, Norman stands behind the counter, staring at Sam, who sits relaxed on a small sofa. Lila is halfway up the stairs, and the CAMERA remains at the foot, TILTING UP as she climbs. She pauses at the top, observing the closed door to the mother's room. After a quiet moment, the door begins to open, and Lila stands on the threshold, disturbed and almost chilled, feeling an impulse to leave. After a moment, she enters, leaving the door open. Inside, there is a four-poster bed, a flounced satin dressing table, a chiffonier, a big wardrobe, a large oval mirror, a satin recamier, an armchair by the window, and a white marble fireplace with cold ashes. Lila glances at the bed, then goes to the dressing table. She catches a glimpse of herself in the mirror, is startled, turns away, goes to the chiffonier, and hesitantly approaches the wardrobe. She opens a door to see clean, well-pressed dresses hanging neatly. Lila exits the mother's room, closes the door, looks down the stairs, then crosses the hall to a room with a half-open door. She pauses, reaches in, and turns on a switch. Sam stands by the counter, glancing out the window at the old house. Lila enters the room, touches a chair, and the touch disturbs the figure, causing it to turn slowly and stiffly. Lila looks in horror, realizing it is the body of a long-dead woman.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: She sees the alley at the end of the cabins and heads toward it, looking at the old house. As Lila moves forward, the CAMERA approaches the house. She continues purposefully to the porch, stops, looks up, and opens the door, revealing the hallway. Lila ENTERS, closes the door, and listens quietly. Meanwhile, Norman stands behind the counter, staring at Sam on a sofa. Lila climbs the stairs, and the CAMERA TILTS UP. She pauses at the top, observing the closed door to the mother's room. The door opens, and Lila, disturbed, enters, leaving it open. Inside are a four-poster bed, a satin dressing table, a chiffonier, a wardrobe, a pier-glass, a recamier, an armchair, and a fireplace. Lila glances at the bed, goes to the dressing table, sees herself in the pier-glass, turns away, and hesitantly opens the wardrobe to find clean dresses. Lila exits, closes the door, looks down the stairs, and crosses the hall to a half-open door. She pauses, turns on a switch, and enters. Sam stands by the counter, glancing at the house. Lila touches a chair, disturbing a figure that turns, revealing a long-dead woman's body.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: She notices the narrow, small alleyway situated at the very end of the L-shaped arrangement of cabins and begins to make her way toward it. As she advances, her gaze is fixed on the old, weathered house that stands prominently against the backdrop of the sky. Lila continues to move forward with determination, and simultaneously, the CAMERA draws closer to the house, capturing its imposing presence. As she proceeds, the house looms ever nearer. Lila glances upward at the house, maintaining her purposeful stride toward the house and its inviting porch. Upon reaching the house, she pauses momentarily to look up, then turns her attention back to it. The CAMERA ascends the steps leading to the porch, and Lila's hand gently pushes the door open, revealing the dimly lit hallway beyond. Lila ENTERS PAST CAMERA, closes the door behind her, and lingers by it for a brief moment, enveloped in silence and listening intently. Meanwhile, Norman is positioned behind the counter, standing and intently staring at Sam, who is seated in a relaxed manner on a small, comfortable sofa. Lila is now halfway up the stairs, and the CAMERA remains stationed at the foot of the stairway, TILTING UP as she ascends. She pauses at the top of the stairs, taking note of the closed door to the mother's room on her right. A moment of stillness ensues, then the door begins to open, and Lila stands on the threshold, peering into the room. She is instantly disturbed by what she sees, almost chilled, with an expression that suggests an urge to close the door and leave the room behind forever. After a brief hesitation, she steps inside, leaving the door ajar behind her. Within the room, there is a four-poster bed devoid of a canopy, an ornate and flounced satin dressing table, a grand chiffonier, a large wardrobe with imposing doors, a sizable oval full-length pier-glass mounted against the wall directly opposite the door, a satin recamier, an upholstered armchair positioned by the window, and a white marble fireplace with a grate that is cold but filled with ashes. Lila casts a glance at the bed and, after a moment of contemplation, approaches the dressing table. She moves onward, catching a glimpse of her reflection in the pier-glass, which startles her, prompting her to turn away. She approaches the chiffonier, about to open a drawer, but then notices the tall wardrobe out of the corner of her eye and approaches it with hesitation. She opens one of its doors to reveal fresh, clean, and well-pressed dresses hanging neatly inside. Lila exits the mother's room, closes the door behind her, looks down the stairs, and then begins to cross the hall toward the room with the half-open door. Lila pauses at the threshold, reaches inside, feels along the wall, and flips a switch to turn on the light. Sam has risen from his seat and is now standing by the counter, turning his head to glance out the window at the old house. Lila enters the room, approaches the chair, and touches it. Her touch disturbs the figure, causing it to begin turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise direction. Lila gazes at it in horror, realizing with shock that it is the body of a woman who has been long dead.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: She becomes aware of the narrow, small alleyway that is situated at the very end of the L-shaped arrangement of cabins and begins to make her way slowly toward it. As she advances with measured steps, her gaze is unwaveringly fixed on the old, weathered house that stands prominently against the expansive backdrop of the sky. Lila continues to move forward with a sense of determination, and simultaneously, the CAMERA begins to draw closer to the house, capturing its imposing and formidable presence. As she proceeds further along her path, the house looms ever nearer, growing larger in her line of sight. Lila glances upward at the house, maintaining her purposeful stride toward the house and its inviting, welcoming porch. Upon reaching the house, she pauses momentarily to look up, then turns her attention back to it, a quiet resolve in her demeanor. The CAMERA ascends the steps leading up to the porch, and Lila's hand gently pushes the door open, revealing the dimly lit hallway beyond its threshold. Lila ENTERS PAST CAMERA, closes the door softly behind her, and lingers by it for a brief moment, surrounded by silence and listening intently to the quiet around her. Meanwhile, Norman is positioned behind the nearby counter, standing with intent and intently staring at Sam, who is seated in a relaxed manner on a small, comfortable sofa. Lila has progressed to being halfway up the stairs, and the CAMERA remains stationed at the foot of the stairway, TILTING UP as she ascends further. She pauses at the top of the stairs, taking a moment to note the closed door to the mother's room on her right side. A pregnant moment of stillness follows, then the door begins to open, and Lila stands on the threshold, peering cautiously into the room. She is immediately disturbed by what she sees, almost chilled to her core, with an expression that suggests an overpowering urge to close the door and leave the room behind forever. After a brief hesitation, she steps inside, leaving the door ajar behind her. Within the room, there is a four-poster bed that is devoid of a canopy, an ornate and flounced satin dressing table, a grand chiffonier, a large wardrobe with imposing doors, a sizable oval full-length pier-glass mounted conspicuously against the wall directly opposite the door, a satin recamier, an upholstered armchair positioned strategically by the window, and a white marble fireplace, cold but filled with gray ashes. Lila casts a glance at the bed and, after a moment of quiet contemplation, moves toward the dressing table. She moves onward, catching a glimpse of her reflection in the pier-glass, which startles her, prompting her to turn away quickly. She then approaches the chiffonier, about to open a drawer, but then notices the tall wardrobe out of the corner of her eye and approaches it with a sense of hesitancy. She opens one of its doors to reveal fresh, clean, and well-pressed dresses hanging neatly in a row inside. Lila exits the mother's room, closes the door firmly behind her, looks down the stairs, and then begins to cross the hall toward the room with the half-open door. Lila pauses at the threshold, reaches inside, feels along the wall, and flips a switch to turn on the light. Sam has risen from his seat and is now standing by the counter, turning his head to glance out the window at the old house with a thoughtful expression. Lila enters the room, approaches the chair, and touches it lightly. Her touch disturbs the figure, causing it to begin turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise direction. Lila gazes at it with horror, realizing with shock that it is the body of a woman who has been dead for a long time.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She notices the small alley at the end of the L-shaped arrangement of cabins and begins to make her way toward it, her eyes fixed on the old house silhouetted against the sky. As Lila advances, the CAMERA moves in tandem, drawing closer to the house. She continues her approach, and the house looms larger in her view. Lila lifts her gaze to the house, maintaining her determined stride toward the porch. Upon reaching the house, she halts and looks up once more before turning her attention back to the structure. The CAMERA ascends the steps to the porch, and Lila's hand reaches out to push the door open, revealing the hallway beyond. Lila steps past the CAMERA, enters the house, closes the door behind her, and pauses momentarily, standing quietly and listening intently. Meanwhile, Norman is positioned behind the counter, his eyes fixed on Sam, who sits in a relaxed manner on a small sofa. Lila is now halfway up the stairs, and the CAMERA remains stationed at the base, TILTING UP to follow her ascent. She pauses at the top of the stairs, her eyes drawn to the closed door of the mother's room on her right. A brief silence ensues before the door begins to open, and Lila stands at the threshold, peering into the room. She is immediately unsettled by the sight, her expression betraying a strong urge to close the door and retreat from the room forever. After a moment's hesitation, she steps inside, leaving the door ajar behind her. The room contains a four-poster bed without a canopy, a fancy satin-draped dressing table, a grand chiffonier, a large wardrobe with imposing doors, a full-length oval pier-glass against the wall directly opposite the entrance, a satin recamier, an upholstered armchair by the window, and a white marble fireplace with a grate cold but filled with ashes. Lila's gaze falls on the bed, and after a moment of contemplation, she moves to the dressing table. As she continues, she catches a glimpse of herself in the pier-glass, is momentarily startled, and turns away, proceeding to the chiffonier. She is about to open a drawer when the high wardrobe catches her eye, prompting her to approach it with hesitation. She opens one of its doors to reveal fresh, clean, well-pressed dresses hanging neatly inside. Lila exits the mother's room, closes the door behind her, glances down the stairs, and then crosses the hall to a room with a half-open door. She pauses at the threshold, reaches inside, feels along the wall, and flips a switch. Meanwhile, Sam has risen and now stands by the counter, turning his head to glance out the window at the old house. Lila enters the room, approaches a chair, and touches it. Her touch disturbs the figure seated there, causing it to begin turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise motion. Lila stares in horror, realizing it is the body of a woman long deceased.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Lila moves purposefully toward the small alley at the end of the L of cabins, her gaze fixed on the old house against the sky. As she approaches, the CAMERA follows her progress until she reaches the porch. She pauses briefly, then pushes the door open, revealing the hallway. Entering quietly, she listens intently before ascending the stairs. The CAMERA remains at the foot of the stairs, capturing her ascent. At the top, she hesitates, observing the closed door to the mother's room. After a moment of contemplation, she enters the room, leaving the door ajar. Inside, she surveys the ornate furnishings, including a four-poster bed, a satin dressing table, and a large pier-glass. Startled by her reflection, she turns away and inspects the chiffonier before hesitantly opening the wardrobe to find neatly hung dresses. Exiting the room, she closes the door and crosses the hall to another room with a half-open door. She pauses, switches on the light, and enters. Meanwhile, Sam, standing by the counter, glances out the window at the house. Inside the room, Lila touches a chair, causing a figure to turn slowly. She recoils in horror, realizing it is the body of a long-dead woman.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She sees the small alley at the end of the L of cabins, a row of rustic lodgings often rented by travelers seeking solitude, and starts toward it. She looks ahead at the old house, a looming Gothic structure with an ominous presence, standing against the sky as Lila moves forward, and the CAMERA approaches the house. She moves on, and the house comes nearer, an imposing relic from a bygone era when it was the pride of the town. Lila looks up at the house, its windows like lifeless eyes, and continues forward purposefully toward the house and the porch. Lila stops at the house, which locals often whisper about for its mysterious past, and looks up, then turns to it again. The CAMERA MOUNTS the steps to the porch, dusty and creaking from years of neglect, and Lila's hand pushes the door open, revealing the dimly lit hallway. Lila ENTERS PAST CAMERA, closes the door, and remains by it for a moment, quiet and listening to the eerie stillness. Meanwhile, Norman is behind the counter of the motel he runs, standing and staring at Sam, who is sitting relaxedly on a small sofa, oblivious to the tension. Lila is halfway up the stairs, the worn carpet still bearing faint traces of once vibrant patterns, and the CAMERA remains at the foot of the stair, TILTING UP as she climbs. She pauses at the head of the stair, observing the closed door to the mother's room on her right, a room long shrouded in secrecy. There is a moment of quiet, then the door begins to open, and Lila stands on the threshold, looking in at the room, instantly disturbed by it, and almost chilled, with an expression indicating an impulse to close the door and go away from the room forever. After a moment, she enters, leaving the door open behind her. Inside, there is a four-poster bed without a canopy, a relic of Victorian opulence, a fancy and flounced satin dressing table, a great chiffonier, a big-doored wardrobe crafted from dark, polished wood, a large oval full-length pier-glass against the wall directly opposite the door, a satin recamier, an upholstered armchair by the window that frames a view of the neglected garden below, and a white marble fireplace with a grate cold but piled with ashes, remnants of fires long extinguished. Lila glances at the bed and, after staring at it for a moment, goes to the dressing table. She moves on, catches a glimpse of herself in the pier-glass, is startled by her own reflection in the dim light, turns away, goes to the chiffonier, is about to open a drawer, sees the high wardrobe out of the corner of her eye, and goes to it hesitantly. She opens one door to see fresh, clean, well-pressed dresses hanging neatly, as though the room's occupant had just stepped out. Lila comes out of the mother's room, closes the door behind her, looks down the stairs into the shadowy depths below, then starts across the hall to the room with the half-open door. Lila pauses on the threshold, reaches in, feels the wall for a switch that clicks loudly in the silence, and throws on a switch. Sam has risen from the sofa where he was sitting casually and is now standing by the counter, turning his head to glance out the window at the old house that looms ominously against the sky. Lila goes into the room, goes to the chair near a dusty window, and touches it. The touch disturbs the figure, causing it to start turning slowly and stiffly in a clockwise movement. Lila looks at it in horror, realizing it is the body of a woman long dead, preserved in a twisted semblance of life.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. Lila glances at the bed and after staring at it for a moment goes to the dressing table. She moves on catches a glimpse of herself in the pierglass is startled turns away goes to the chiffonier is about to open a drawer sees the high wardrobe out of the corner of her eye and goes to it hesitantly. She opens one door to see fresh clean wellpressed dresses hanging neatly. Lila comes out of the mother's room closes the door behind her looks down the stairs then starts across the hall to the room with the halfopen door. Lila pauses on the threshold reaches in feels the wall and throws on a switch. Sam has risen and is standing by the counter now turning his head to glance out the window at the old house. Lila goes into the room goes to the chair and touches it. The touch disturbs the figure causing it to start turning. slowly and stiffly in a clockwise movement. Lila looks at it in horror realizing it is the body of a woman long dead.

During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. After a moment she enters leaving the door open behind her. Inside there is a fourposter bed without a canopy a fancy and flounced satin dressing table a great chiffonier a bigdoored wardrobe a large oval fulllength pierglass against the wall directly opposite the door. a satin recamier an upholstered armchair by the window and a white marble fireplace with a grate cold but piled with ashes. Lila glances at the bed and after staring at it for a moment goes to the dressing table. She moves on catches a glimpse of herself in the pierglass is startled turns away goes to the chiffonier is about to open a drawer sees the high wardrobe out of the corner of her eye and goes to it hesitantly. She opens one door to see fresh clean wellpressed dresses hanging neatly. Lila comes out of the mother's room closes the door behind her looks down the stairs then starts across the hall to the room with the halfopen door. Lila pauses on the threshold reaches in feels the wall and throws on a switch. Sam has risen and is standing by the counter now turning his head to glance out the window at the old house. Lila goes into the room goes to the chair and touches it. The touch disturbs the figure causing it to start turning. slowly and stiffly in a clockwise movement. Lila looks at it in horror realizing it is the body of a woman long dead.

She looks ahead at the old house standing against the sky as Lila moves forward and the CAMERA approaches the house. She moves on and the house comes nearer. Lila looks up at the house and continues forward purposefully toward the house and the porch. Lila stops at the house and looks up then turns to it again. The CAMERA MOUNTS the steps to the porch and Lila's hand pushes the door open revealing the hallway. Lila comes out of the mother's room closes the door behind her looks down the stairs then starts across the hall to the room with the halfopen door. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The cat notices the narrow bridge at the edge of the maze of igloos and drifts toward it. The cat peers above at the ancient tower looming against the horizon as Max drifts onward, and the SPYGLASS drifts toward the tower. Max drifts along, and the tower comes closer. Max gazes skyward at the tower and ambles resolutely toward the tower and the veranda. Max halts at the tower and gazes upward, then pivots to it once more. The SPYGLASS ASCENDS the ladder to the veranda, and Max's paw nudges the gate ajar, unveiling the corridor. Max PASSES BY SPYGLASS, shuts the gate, and lingers beside it briefly, silent and eavesdropping. Meanwhile, Oscar is beyond the register, perching and gazing at Mike, who lounges comfortably on a tiny hammock. Max is midway up the ladder, and the SPYGLASS lingers at the bottom of the ladder, PANNING UP as she ascends. She hesitates at the top of the ladder, examining the ajar gate to the dog's kennel on her left. There is an interval of silence, then the gate commences to creak, and Max lingers on the brink, peering in at the kennel, immediately perturbed by it, and almost jolted, with a demeanor signifying a desire to slam the gate and flee the kennel eternally. After a beat, she proceeds, leaving the gate slightly ajar behind her. Inside, there is a dilapidated hammock void of a canopy, a showy and draped velvet bureau, a grand armoire, a giant-doored cabinet, a vast circular full-length looking glass leaned against the barrier directly across the gate, a velvet chaise longue, a cushioned bench next to the sill, and a black granite stove with a grate frigid but heaped with soot. Max glances at the hammock and, after gawking at it momentarily, wanders to the bureau. She drifts onward, spies a flash of herself in the looking glass, is aghast, swivels aside, wanders to the armoire, is ready to pry open a compartment, notices the towering cabinet out of the corner of her gaze, and moves to it cautiously. She swings one portal ajar to discover spotless, pristine, neatly-folded cloaks suspended meticulously. Max retreats from the dog's kennel, latches the gate behind her, looks downward over the ladder, then crosses the passageway to the sanctuary with the slightly-ajar portal. Max hesitates on the brink, extends an arm, touches the barrier, and flips a dial. Mike has gotten up and is lounging beside the register now, twisting his neck to peek out the pane at the ancient tower. Max ambles into the sanctuary, approaches the bench, and strokes it. The stroke unsettles the mannequin, prompting it to begin spinning slowly and jerkily in an anti-clockwise motion. Max stares at it in terror, realizing it is the sculpture of a creature long expired.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Lila heads toward a small alley at the end of the cabins, advancing purposefully toward an old house. She reaches the porch, opens the door, and enters quietly, listening. Meanwhile, Norman watches Sam from behind the counter. Lila climbs the stairs and pauses at the closed door to the mother's room. Despite an urge to walk away, she enters, disturbed by the room's contents: a bed, a dressing table, a wardrobe, and a cold fireplace with ashes. After inspecting the wardrobe's neat dresses, Lila exits, closes the door, and approaches another room. She switches on the light and touches a chair, causing it to rotate and reveal a long-dead woman's body, horrifying Lila.
